content:
I'm excited to start brainstorming and outlining my short story series, and I think I'll focus on exploring themes of identity, community, and social justice. I want to create characters that are relatable and authentic, and that reflect the diversity of human experience.

One idea I have is to write a story that follows a non-binary character who is navigating their gender identity in a small town where there isn't a lot of understanding or acceptance. I want to explore the challenges they face, as well as the ways in which they find support and community.

Another idea I have is to write a story that explores the intersection of gender identity and race, and how these two aspects of identity can intersect and impact one another. I want to create a character who is both a person of color and non-binary, and explore the ways in which they navigate these different aspects of their identity.

In terms of my online platform, I think I'll start by sharing my short stories and essays, as well as guest
